This Week's Drug News

Novel approvals round out this busy week before Thanksgiving: Viiv Healthcare's Juluca is the first two drug (not three), fixed dose regimen for HIV maintenance, and Hemlibra is a first-in-class agent cleared for hemophilia A with inhibitors.
